title: SnackHunter
notes: Steam shows Positive (94% of 18). SteamDB shows 76.58% positive; small sample keeps score high‑80s. Steam store says players use a smartphone as the controller and can play online or locally; Shared/Split Screen PvP; 18 user reviews. Play mode inferred from description.
raw_comment: Hide and seek game played on phones using an app. The hunter’s location is displayed on the PC screen for everyone to see. Up to 16 players. Shared screen + phone screens.
